title: 5-minute access to 980, 580, and 880 freeways
posting_body: Feature • Open kitchen concept • Stainless steel appliances, gas stove, granite counters • Washer and dryer in unit • Designated parking in secure garage • Access to large, landscaped, shared courtyard • Secure building access • Bicycle parking in garage • Private storage space in garage (approx.
ACCESS AND TRANSPORTATION • 19th Street Bart station is 3 blocks away • 5-minute access to 980, 580, and 880 freeways •
Nearby neighborhoods: Rockridge, Temescal, Piedmont Avenue, Old Oakland, Jack London, and Chinatown NEARBY AMENITIES •
Oakland YMCA 1 block • Lake Merritt 3 blocks • Whole Foods 5 blocks •

A 3-10 minute walk to great dining/cafe/bar/entertainment options: Drake's Dealership, Calavera, Firebrand, Sweet Bar, Parkway Movie Theater, MUA, A La Mar, Farley's East, Luka's Taproom, True Burger, Plum Bar, Umami Burger, Agave, The Paramount Theater, Fox Theater, Flora, Duende, Camber, and many others
